# updateAction

**Instance Property**

The action being performed on the item.

## Declaration

```swift

```

## Discussion

For a list of relevant action types, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewUpdateItem/Action].

## Accessing the item changes

- **indexPathBeforeUpdate**: The index path of the item before the update.
- **indexPathAfterUpdate**: The index path of the item after the update.
- **UICollectionViewUpdateItem.Action**: Constants indicating the type of action being performed on an item.
